SEARCH

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
Represents a hotel, managing its rooms and reservations. It provides methods to add/remove rooms, manage reservations, and compute earnings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Hotel(String name)
    Constructs a new `Hotel` with the specified name.

      public Hotel(String name)
      Constructs a new `Hotel` with the specified name. Initializes the room list, reservation list, and default room price.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the hotel.

    • findRoom

      public Room findRoom(int roomName)
      Finds the index of a room by its name.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The name of the room to find.
      Returns:
      The room itself if it is found; 'null' if not found.

      public void removeRoom(String roomType)
      Removes a room from the hotel.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room to remove.

    • isFullyBooked

      public boolean isFullyBooked()
      Checks if the hotel is fully booked for all dates (1-31).
      Returns:
      `true` if all rooms are fully booked; `false` otherwise.

    • computeEarnings

      public double computeEarnings()
      Computes the total earnings from all reservations in the hotel.
      Returns:
      The total earnings.

    • addReservation

      public boolean addReservation(String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, String roomType)
      Adds a reservation to the hotel for a specified guest and date range.
      Parameters:
      guestName - The name of the guest.
      checkInDate - The check-in date.
      checkOutDate - The check-out date.
      roomType - the type of room to be reserved
      Returns:
      `true` if the reservation was successfully added; `false` otherwise.

    • addReservation

      public boolean addReservation(String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, String roomType, String discount)
      Adds a reservation to the hotel for a specified guest and date range with a given discount code.
      Parameters:
      guestName - The name of the guest.
      checkInDate - The check-in date.
      checkOutDate - The check-out date.
      roomType - the type of room to be reserved
      discount - The discount code the guest used.
      Returns:
      `true` if the reservation was successfully added; `false` otherwise.

      Returns:
